doc:
Lee Kinsolving https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Kinsolving 0 Arthur Lee Kinsolving Jr. (August 30, 1938 – December 4, 1974), known professionally as Lee Kinsolving, was an American film, theater and television actor. In 1960, Kinsolving was nominated for a Golden Globe for Best Supporting Actor at the 18th Golden Globe Awards for his role as Sammy Goldenbaum in the film The Dark at the Top of the Stairs. He lost the award to actor Sal Mineo. Arthur_Lee_Kinsolving_Jr. ( August_30_,_1938 – December_4_,_1974 ) , known professionally as Lee_Kinsolving , was an_American_film_,_theater_and_television_actor . In 1960 , Kinsolving was_nominated for a_Golden_Globe_for_Best_Supporting_Actor at the_18th_Golden_Globe_Awards for his_role as Sammy_Goldenbaum in the_film The_Dark at the_Top of the_Stairs . He lost the_award to actor_Sal_Mineo .
